definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Some people's fear of marriage can be traced back to their parents' divorce. ;
sentences.chinese: 一些人对婚姻的惊骇可以追溯到他们怙恃的仳离。

sentences.english: The new couple divorced each other.
The combustion of carbon deposited on catalysts was carried out in a stream of oxygen at high temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 在高温下于氧气流中燃燃仳化剂积炭。

sentences.english: She remarried her former husband ten year after their divorce.
sentences.chinese: 她与原来的丈夫仳离十年后又复婚了。

sentences.english: According to a new study, divorce is catching.
sentences.chinese: 一项最新研究表现，仳离会熏染。

sentences.english: If marriage is the accomplishment, how about divorce?
sentences.chinese: 如果结婚才是爱的完成的话，那仳离又算啥子呢？

sentences.english: Expectations can either make or break a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 对婚姻的期望既可能保有一段婚姻也可能导致仳离。

definition: plant mentioned in Book of Songs, uncertainly identified as carambola or star fruit (Averrhoa carambola)
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]
